info-form.title: Information
info-form.paragraph: Be a volunteer! The objective of The Dominican American Coalition of Connecticut is to educate and improve the quality of life of many people. Thanks to people like you we'll be able to reach our goals. If you have time to collaborate in our projects, Contact us and become a volunteer!

footer.alt-logo: Logo with flags of The Dominican Republic and The United States where they make a social contribution in Connecticut
footer.paragraph: The Dominican-American Coalition is a non profit organization with the code 501 C 3.
